post.text: "That reporter and I have the same condition. When Mr. Trump made fun of him, that hurt my feelings."

comment.author: Dylan
comment.text: Wow, look at all the Trump Trolls here. It's amazing to me that they can be so convinced of the truth of information supplied by a man who can hardly open his mouth without lying or at the very least distorting the truth. It's like someone in an abusive relationship thinking the abuse(lying) will stop once they get married(elected). Keep in mind, everything bad you've heard about Hillary is second hand. All you had to do is watch the debates to know Trump's lies firsthand.

replies.author: Adam
replies.text: Keep the faith and keep sucking on Jeffery Epstien and Anthony Weiner's wiener... Bill Clinton and Jeffery like thier women to be five years of age and wiener likes his fifteen. I wonder what wieners computer shows? Oh, bill Clinton likes his women to be five years old... Keep sucking on those wieners.
